net.grinder.plugin.http.tcpproxyfilter
Interface HTTPFilterEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionCache
public interface HTTPFilterEventListener

A listener for events generated by HTTPRequestFilter and HTTPResponseFilter.

Public as it is wired by PicoContainer.

Author:
Philip Aston
